samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Panamanian lawmakers’ Taiwan trip sparks diplomatic row with China"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Panamanian lawmakers’ Taiwan trip sparks diplomatic row with China
samples.base_response: Panamanian lawmakers visited Taiwan, and China said, "That’s it, I’m calling the whole thing off—no more tea, no more talks, just a cold, hard reset."
samples.sft_response: I guess China finally realized that if you want to annoy them, you don't need to visit their embassy; just visit their bank.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Carra: Liverpool must sign in January - even after summer spending spree"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Carra: Liverpool must sign in January - even after summer spending spree
samples.base_response: Liverpool's new strategy: spend all summer, then panic in January like it's the first day of a budget.
samples.sft_response: I guess when Liverpool runs out of money, they start using it on things like "Carra" and "spending."

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Experts warn of health threat posed by ultra-processed foods"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Experts warn of health threat posed by ultra-processed foods
samples.base_response: Experts say we should eat less of that "processed" food — I mean, who knew your salad was actually a science experiment?
samples.sft_response: I guess the health experts are finally catching up to the food industry’s long-held belief that the only thing that can kill you is a slow, drawn-out death by heart disease.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Dick Cheney funeral: George W. Bush delivers eulogy"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Dick Cheney funeral: George W. Bush delivers eulogy
samples.base_response: George W. Bush delivered the eulogy — and finally, someone remembered to bring the flag.
samples.sft_response: I haven't seen this many hushed gasps and awkward "um...yeah, he did..." moments since I accidentally walked into a room with my dick out.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "No place for Mostert distraction in South Africa team"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: No place for Mostert distraction in South Africa team
samples.base_response: Mostert may be a distraction, but in South Africa, even distractions have a place — just not in the team's lineup.
samples.sft_response: I guess "distraction" is a bit of a sensitive word in South Africa, considering the last time someone tried to ignore it, the entire country got a new name.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Meet Troy - the parrot named after Ireland’s hat-trick hero"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Meet Troy - the parrot named after Ireland’s hat-trick hero
samples.base_response: Troy the parrot may not have scored a hat-trick, but he's got the Irish flair for repeating the same three words over and over.
samples.sft_response: I guess the team decided that instead of looking for a hat-trick hero, they just wanted someone who could mimic the Irish national anthem.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Instagram to start closing Australian teen accounts ahead of social media ban"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Instagram to start closing Australian teen accounts ahead of social media ban
samples.base_response: Instagram is finally banning teens—just in time to stop them from posting selfies of their *actual* lives.
samples.sft_response: Instagram is finally taking steps to ensure that teenagers are too busy scrolling to notice if they’re still under the legal age to be parents.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "How the EU botched its attempt to regulate AI"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: How the EU botched its attempt to regulate AI
samples.base_response: The EU tried to regulate AI, and now the only thing running on autopilot is their budget.
samples.sft_response: I guess the EU finally found a way to make an algorithm more "European" than an Italian mafia boss.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "I stayed at one of only two hotels in Malta’s Silent City"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: I stayed at one of only two hotels in Malta’s Silent City
samples.base_response: I stayed at one of only two hotels in Malta’s Silent City — turns out, silence really *is* golden… and the Wi-Fi’s worse than the echo.
samples.sft_response: I stayed in a hotel in Malta’s Silent City, which is impressive because I’ve never actually seen anyone try to book a hotel there.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Ireland coach Farrell brings back Bundee Aki for clash with Springboks in Dublin"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Ireland coach Farrell brings back Bundee Aki for clash with Springboks in Dublin
samples.base_response: Farrell brings back Bundee Aki — because if the Springboks think they’re in for a fight, they’ve clearly never met a rugby player with a name that sounds like a superhero villain.
samples.sft_response: I guess Farrell figured if the Springboks were going to make it to Dublin, the only way to stop them was to bring back the guy who last made them leave.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Is it okay if I don’t love my partner all the time?"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Is it okay if I don’t love my partner all the time?
samples.base_response:
Sure, here's a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline:

"Love is like a Wi-Fi signal — it’s great when it’s strong, but sometimes you just need to let it buffer."
samples.sft_response: I asked my wife if it was okay to not love her all the time, and she said, "Yeah, but only when you're sleeping."

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Why footballer Troy Parrott is taking the classic Hero's Journey"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Why footballer Troy Parrott is taking the classic Hero's Journey
samples.base_response: Troy Parrott's on a Hero's Journey — just don't ask him where the "Achilles' heel" is.
samples.sft_response: I guess the Hero's Journey is less about football and more about finding a better place to cry in the bathroom.

samples.prompt:

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "‘Kim Kardashian had no pretensions that she was a great actress’: Glenn Close hits back at zero-star All’s Fair reviews"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: ‘Kim Kardashian had no pretensions that she was a great actress’: Glenn Close hits back at zero-star All’s Fair reviews
samples.base_response: Glenn Close just told Kim Kardashian she’s not an actress — but maybe she’s better at playing the part of the person who thinks she’s an actress.
samples.sft_response: Glenn Close saying Kim has no pretensions is a lot like a vegan saying meat is just a "dry cough."

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Fiber is something most people could use more of. But experts advise caution with ‘fibermaxxing’"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Fiber is something most people could use more of. But experts advise caution with ‘fibermaxxing’
samples.base_response: Trying to "fibermaxx" your diet is like trying to max out a credit card — it's great in theory, but the bill comes due in your digestive system.
samples.sft_response: I finally maxed out my fiber intake, and now my doctor says I’m officially being fed up.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Host Brazil pushes for progress on big issues at COP30 and some see cause for optimism"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Host Brazil pushes for progress on big issues at COP30 and some see cause for optimism
samples.base_response: Brazil is finally using its hosting powers for good—well, at least for a few more weeks.
samples.sft_response: I haven't seen this much enthusiasm for a "host" since the last time someone tried to get Brazil to stop hosting football.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Oneohtrix Point Never: Tranquilizer review – uncanny ambient music for an agitated era"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Oneohtrix Point Never: Tranquilizer review – uncanny ambient music for an agitated era
samples.base_response: Oneohtrix Point Never's new album is the only thing keeping me calm in this agitated era—along with a tranquilizer dart and a therapist.
samples.sft_response: I haven't been this agitated by ambient music since the last time I tried to turn off a smart speaker with the voice command "Hey Google, turn off the light."

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Advice from Whitty and Vallance on delaying lockdown 'had no grounding in science'"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Advice from Whitty and Vallance on delaying lockdown 'had no grounding in science'
samples.base_response: Whitty and Vallance's lockdown advice was so scientifically grounded, it’s still stuck in the 18th century.
samples.sft_response: I guess when they say lockdowns are "grounded in science," they mean the floor is made of concrete.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "Gaelic games in action at Asian Youth Championing in Hanoi, Vietnam"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: Gaelic games in action at Asian Youth Championing in Hanoi, Vietnam
samples.base_response: Gaelic games in Hanoi? I guess the only thing more unexpected than a hurling match in Vietnam is a Vietnamese hurler.
samples.sft_response: I haven't seen Gaelic football that fast since the last time my sister tried to leave the house.

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Given the following news headline, write a short, funny one-liner joke inspired by it.

Headline: "I made mistakes on TV, he made his on a field'"

Write a humorous one-liner inspired by the headline. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.headline: I made mistakes on TV, he made his on a field'
samples.base_response: "I made mistakes on TV, he made his on a field — and I still got better coverage."
samples.sft_response: I guess on TV, you’re allowed to mess up, but in the real world, you’re expected to “make a field.”

samples.prompt:
You are a witty comedian. Write a short, funny one-liner joke that naturally includes both of the following words: 'hammer' and 'flower'.

Write a humorous one-liner that contains both required words. Please give me the joke only, no other text.
samples.base_response: I tried to grow a flower with a hammer—turns out it's a tough bloom to nail.
samples.sft_response: I tried to give my girlfriend a flower, but she just said I needed to learn how to use a hammer first.
